##Moves to a chapter through save-dialog.
MNCH, 0x3D, 8, -game:FE6 -indexMode:8
##Chapter to move to.
	Chapter ID, 4, 4

MNCH, 0x81, 4, -game:FE7 -indexMode:8
	Chapter ID, 2, 2

MNCH, 0x2A21, 4, -game:FE8 -indexMode:8
	Chapter ID, 2, 2

##Moves to a chapter directly.
MNC2, 0x2A22, 4, -game:FE8 -indexMode:8
##Chapter to move to.
	Chapter ID, 2, 2
